posts.post_content:
These are the top two t206's on my wish list. 
Prefer SGC/PSA, low grade is fine, prefer number to A, and not very keen on qualifiers. 
I'm OK with soft corners and even creases, as long as there's still decent eye appeal. 
Please let me know what you've got. 
Thanks for looking.

I have these two:
T206Walter Johnson PortraitPSA2
T206Sovereign Johnson, Walter  PortraitSGC1.5

And will have this sometime next week.
T206Mathewson, Christy PortraitPSA2

Finally scored a WaJo portrait... You're next, Big 6!
